text: I am trying to understand Julia syntax. For example, in this code, `_using_ Colors; Colors.colorant"red"` I am trying to understand the `colorant"red"` part. Can anybody explain the Julia syntax at work here? Is this a function call / constant lookup / string? I am more accustomed to seeing `colorant(red)` from other programming languages, and the placement of double quote is very bizarre to me.

text: It is macrocall. The syntax `x"..."` calls `@x_str "..."` basically, see <https://docs.julialang.org/en/v1/manual/metaprogramming/#Non-Standard-String-Literals>
